content:
#17507 adds a script that calculates which modules are "really used" by a given module. That then enables mathlib-tools#136, which add the --show-unused flag for import-graph, which I'm finding very helpful for identifying dubious imports.

Once this flag is enabled I may get a bot to regularly post progress report graphs of the porting process.
It would be helpful for me to have this in master, in order to add some more reporting from the port-progress bot.
